name: OCKChartController
desc: A controller object that handles updating charts.

items.name: init(weekOfDate: Date, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new chart view controller for a specific week.

items.name: let objectWillChange: CurrentValueSubject<[OCKDataSeries], Never>
items.desc: A publisher that publishes a contact when it changes in the store.

items.name: var store: OCKAnyEventStore
items.desc: A reference to the store that fetches and updates events.

items.name: let storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager
items.desc: The object that synchronizes between the store and controller.

items.name: func fetchAndObserveInsights(forConfigurations: [OCKDataSeriesConfiguration], errorHandler: ((Error) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Retrieves and observes insights data, using an array of specific data series configurations.
